string-array.name: help_texts
string-array.item: When exporting, a copy of the current database is created in the "Exported Databases" folder. Along with the .db database file, images are also exported, their names cannot be changed, since would not be imported. The database file and the folder with images can be renamed as long as they have the same name.

To import the database, select the .db database file on the device. To import images there a folder with images must exist in the same folder as the database. Images folder and database file must have the same name. For example, \"124576.db\" and \"124576\". When importing, the old database will be deleted!
To delete a category, tap on it and hold until the delete dialog opens. To delete a banknote, open its full view and tap on the delete icon.
To swap the objects in the list, click the move icon. After that, click&hold on the object you want to move and then drag it to a new location. To save changes, click \"Back\" or \"Done\".
With the \"Automatic backup\" option enabled, the database will be automatically saved to the \"Exported Databases\" folder when entering new categories/banknotes list screen.
